mapper.insert: INSERT INTO personal (personal_name, personal_email, personal_education, personal_phone_number, personal_address, created_at) VALUES(#{personalName},#{personalEmail}, #{personalEducation}, #{personalPhoneNumber}, #{personalAddress}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT personal_name, personal_email, personal_phone_number , personal_education from personal WHERE personal_id = #{personalId}

SELECT personal_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(personal_address,',',1),',',-1) AS zonecode, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(personal_address,',',2),',',-1) AS road_jibunAddr, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(personal_address,',',3),',',-1) AS detail_address FROM personal where personal_id = #{personalId}
SELECT * FROM personal left OUTER JOIN users ON personal.personal_id = users.personal_id WHERE personal.personal_id = #{personalId}
mapper.update: UPDATE personal SET personal_name = #{personalName}, personal_email = #{personalEmail}, personal_phone_number = #{personalPhoneNumber}, personal_education = #{personalEducation}, personal_address = #{personalAddress} WHERE personal_id = #{personalId}
